name: Witch’s Cat
description: A spin-off from the Rabi Laby series, in the previous adventure, the Queen sent her precious minions, the Cheshire Cats, to capture Alice and Rabi. Shortly, after they were captured, a Cheshire Cat named Alicia, became curious of Alice and instinctually knew that Alice was a good person. Alicia, unknown to Alice and Rabi, helped them both escape from their imprisonment. Inspired by Alice, Alicia desired to become a human. The Queen learned of Alicia’s secret and banished her from her kingdom. Dubois a powerful witch with a questionable reputation and a foe of the Queen discovers Alicia and helped her escape. Dubois offers her assistance to transform Alicia to a human. Alicia, well aware that she is no longer welcomed in Wonderland, and with her deep desire to become a human, reluctantly accepted her proposal, despite Dubois’s reputation. Together Alicia and Dubois set out on an ambitious journey to escape Wonderland and travel to the human world.
